“nenawathwama yachnya kirima” ta apata niyoga di atha (1 thesalonika 5:17), saha awidima apa dinapatha karana kriyawaliyak bawin nisakayenma nonawathwa karana yachnyawe kotasak nam awidina kala yachnya kirimayi.

mahanuwara nagaraye pujaniyathwaya shi්ra wibhuthiya ha aithihasikathwaya mulu lowatama kiyapana athipujaniya shi්ra danshta්ra dhathu mandiraya, malwathu asgiri ubhaya maha wiharaya, natha, wishnu, katharagama, paththini yana siwmaha dewala, raja maliga sankirnaya wani smaraka mulkota loka uruma nagarayak bawata pathwiya.
